ItemType.name: KM60 Engdong missile
ItemType.description: This is a standard hexagene high-explosive missile; cheap and light, they are the weapon of choice for modern patrol fleets.

ItemType.name: KM80 Gungdo missile
ItemType.description: This is a standard hexagene high-explosive missile; cheap and light, they are the weapon of choice for modern patrol fleets.

ItemType.name: Charon Kanjar missile
ItemType.description: These homemade missiles are produced by the Charon Pirates.

ItemType.name: KM100 Longbow missile
ItemType.description: This is a standard hexagene high-explosive missile; cheap and light, they are the weapon of choice for modern patrol fleets.

ItemType.name: KM110 Starburst missile
ItemType.description: The warhead of this NAMI-compatible missile explodes into more than a dozen high-velocity shards.

ItemType.name: KM120 Brute missile
ItemType.description: This is a heavier and more powerful version of the KM100.

ItemType.name: KM140 Cinquedea missile
ItemType.description: This is a heavier and more powerful version of the KM100.

ItemType.name: KM500 Stiletto missile
ItemType.description: A powerful optical and infrared tracking module allows this missile to home in on its target.

ItemType.name: KM510 Firecracker missile
ItemType.description: A powerful optical and infrared tracking module allows this missile to home in on its target.

ItemType.name: KM520 Baselard missile
ItemType.description: A powerful optical and infrared tracking module allows this missile to home in on its target.

ItemType.name: XM300 Reaper missile
ItemType.description: The XM300 warhead is jacketed with small amounts of plutonium. Though not enough for fission, the radioactive materials contaminate the target.

ItemType.name: KM550 Broadsword missile
ItemType.description: The Broadsword missile is a heavier version of the tracking KM500 series.

ItemType.name: XM900 Lucifer missile
ItemType.description: An optical tracking missile carrying a 100-kiloton thermonuclear warhead. The XM900 is tightly controlled; only military vessels may carry them.

Default.desc: Choose the NAMI missile type to load the pod:

Actions.Action:
(block (itemType cursor) (setq PickedItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (setq itemType (itmGetUNID PickedItem))
(switch (eq itemType &itKM100Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKM100Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM100; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itKM60Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKM60Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM60; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itKM80Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKM80Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM80; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itFragmentationMissile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itFragmentationMissile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM110; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itKM120Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKM120Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM120; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itKM140Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKM140Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM140; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) )
(eq itemType &itKM500Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKM500Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM500; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) )
(eq itemType &itKM520Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKM520Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM520; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itKM550Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKM550Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodKM550; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itXM300Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itXM300Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodXM300; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itXM900Missile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itXM900Missile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodXM900; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) ) (eq itemType &itPirateMissile;) (block (theMissiles) (setq theMissiles (itmGetCount PickedItem)) (if (geq theMissiles 4) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itPirateMissile; 1) 4) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objaddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itNAMImissilePodCharon; 1) 1)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Used") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NotEnough") ) )
) )

NotEnough.desc: Not Enough Missiles. You need at least 4

ItemType.name: an empty NAMI pod
ItemType.description: This is an empty NAMI mine launcher pod, it can be loaded with 4 NAMI missiles and launched with a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM100 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM100 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM60 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM60 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM80 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM80 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM110 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM110 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM120 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM120 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM140 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM140 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM500 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM500 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM520 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM520 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: KM550 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 KM550 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: XM300 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 XM300 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: XM900 loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 XM900 missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: Charon Kanjar loaded pod
ItemType.description: A NAMI missile pod loaded with 4 Charon Kanjar missiles. Ready to be launched by a NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: 400 Hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: This is a standard hexagene high-explosive grenade compatible with the MAG launcher.

ItemType.name: 500 Hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: This is a larger version of the 400 MAG grenade. It is compatible with the MAG launcher.

ItemType.name: 600 Hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: This is a larger version of the 400 MAG grenade. It is compatible with the MAG launcher.

ItemType.name: 700 Hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: This is a larger version of the 400 MAG grenade. It is compatible with the MAG launcher.

ItemType.name: 800F Hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: The largest MAG in common use, the 800F series packs twice as much hexagene as the 400 MAG and surrounds it with a fragmentation jacket.

ItemType.name: JB2 shield buster MAG
ItemType.description: This specialized MAG is designed to inflict enhanced damage to energy fields.

ItemType.name: 1000F Thermo MAG
ItemType.description: Military version of the classical 800F MAG

ItemType.name: ZG12 Cluster MAG
ItemType.description: The ZG12 Cluster MAG is a cluster grenade that explodes into dozens of smaller hexagene explosives. This version is smaller and cheaper then the ubiquitous ZG24.

ItemType.name: ZG48 Cluster MAG
ItemType.description: The ZG48 Cluster MAG is a cluster grenade that explodes into dozens of smaller hexagene explosives. This version is a custom illegal version of the ZG24.

ItemType.name: ZG24 Cluster MAG
ItemType.description: The ZG24 Cluster MAG is a cluster grenade that explodes into dozens of smaller hexagene explosives.

ItemType.name: 1K Siege MAG
ItemType.description: This heavy MAG grenade packs almost 50kg of hexagene explosives, a quantity sufficient to blast through the heavy armor of fortresses and military installations.

ItemType.name: 2K Siege MAG
ItemType.description: This heavy MAG grenade packs almost 75kg of hexagene explosives, a quantity sufficient to blast through the heavy armor of fortresses and military installations.

ItemType.name: 3K Siege MAG
ItemType.description: This heavy MAG grenade packs almost 100kg of hexagene explosives, a quantity sufficient to blast through the heavy armor of fortresses and military installations.

ItemType.name: 98R high-flux MAG
ItemType.description: Military variant of the popular MAG series is this thermonuclear and radiological variant.

ItemType.name: White Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The Strelka series of light missiles is compatible with the Makayev launcher. The White Strelka is the cheapest and least powerful of the series.

ItemType.name: Green Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The Strelka series of light missiles is compatible with the Makayev launcher. The Green Strelka packs more punch than the White version.

ItemType.name: Blue Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The Strelka series of light missiles is compatible with the Makayev launcher. The Blue Strelka packs more punch than the Green version.

ItemType.name: Purple Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The Strelka series of light missiles is compatible with the Makayev launcher. The Purple Strelka packs more punch than the Blue version.

ItemType.name: Red Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The Red Strelka is a thermonuclear version of the Makayev-compatible missile series.

ItemType.name: Brown Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The Brown Strelka is a custom illegal thermonuclear version of the Makayev-compatible missile series.

ItemType.name: Black Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The rare and powerful Black Strelka releases a dozen thermonuclear submunitions. It is compatible with the Makayev launcher.

ItemType.name: Azure Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The powerful Azure Strelka is the only Strelka non-thermonuclear missile used by the military. It is compatible with the Makayev launcher. It detonates a powerful charge of the new heptagene explosive.

ItemType.name: CRM100 Fatboy mine
ItemType.description: The CRM100 is a thermonuclear static mine deployed by the NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: FRM300 Fruitfly mine
ItemType.description: The FRM300 is a thermonuclear static mine deployed by the NAMI mine launcher. When exploded it fragments in dozens of smaller thermonuclear charges.

ItemType.name: DVC100 Starfish mine
ItemType.description: The DVC100 Starfish mine releases a strong ion impulse that destroys internal devices of unshielded ships.

ItemType.name: CRM500 Running Man mine
ItemType.description: The CRM500 is a tracking thermonuclear mine deployed by the NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: CRM900 Stalker mine
ItemType.description: The CRM900 is a 100 kiloton tracking thermonuclear mine deployed by the NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: Gotha-10 missile
ItemType.description: This hypervelocity missile is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher. Loaded with a 1 kiloton warhead.

ItemType.name: Gotha-20 missile
ItemType.description: This hypervelocity missile is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher. Loaded with a 2 kiloton warhead.

ItemType.name: Gotha-30 missile
ItemType.description: This hypervelocity missile is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher. Loaded with a 3 kiloton warhead.

ItemType.name: Gotha-42 fragmenting missile
ItemType.description: This hypervelocity missile is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher. This version fragments in dozens of thermonuclear charges.

ItemType.name: Gotha-600 missile
ItemType.description: This hypervelocity missile is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher. This version has a rarely used 6 kiloton warhead.

ItemType.name: Gotha-400 seeker
ItemType.description: This is a tracking missile with a 1 kiloton-yield warhead. It is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher.

ItemType.name: Gotha-8000 seeker
ItemType.description: This is a tracking missile with a 3 kiloton-yield warhead. It is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher.

ItemType.name: M1 Mercury missile
ItemType.description: The M1 is a heavy siege weapon launched by the NAMI heavy launcher. It is designed to attack capital ships and stations. The M1 is cheaper and less devastating then the M2.

ItemType.name: M2 Vulcan missile
ItemType.description: The M2 is a heavy siege weapon launched by the NAMI heavy launcher. It is designed to attack capital ships and stations.

ItemType.name: S3 Medusa missile
ItemType.description: Soon after launch, the S3 Medusa explodes to reveal a dozen independently-tracking thermonuclear missiles. The S3 requires the NAMI heavy launcher.

ItemType.name: S9 Hydra missile
ItemType.description: The S9 Hydra is a much improved version of the S3 Medusa missile. It requires the NAMI heavy launcher.

ItemType.name: M5 Nemesis missile
ItemType.description: The M5 Nemesis missile is an upgraded version of the M2. It requires the NAMI heavy launcher.

ItemType.name: P1 Guardian missile
ItemType.description: The P1 Guardian missile is designed to use its thermonuclear charge to release a devastating plasma shockwave. It requires the NAMI heavy launcher.

ItemType.name: E1 Halcyon missile
ItemType.description: This prototype missile for the NAMI Heavy launcher releases a burst of highly charged ions, it's designed to block capital ships without destroying them completely by disabling unshielded computers.

ItemType.name: SmartCannon round
ItemType.description: SmartCannons are recoilless weapons modified to shoot special tracking shells. A SmartCannon round can adjust its path to strike a designated target. Standard rounds.

ItemType.name: Fullmetal SmartLauncher round
ItemType.description: SmartCannons are recoilless weapons modified to shoot special tracking shells. A SmartCannon round can adjust its path to strike a designated target. These rounds are othosteel plated.

ItemType.name: Fast moving SmartLauncher round
ItemType.description: SmartCannons are recoilless weapons modified to shoot special tracking shells. A SmartCannon round can adjust its path to strike a designated target.

ItemType.name: Explosive SmartLauncher round
ItemType.description: SmartCannons are recoilless weapons modified to shoot special tracking shells. A SmartCannon round can adjust its path to strike a designated target. This version loads a small hexagene charge.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 shell cartridge
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the Akan 30 cannon. Standard version.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 thermo shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the Akan 30 LAUNCHER cannon. This version uses has a nuclear minicharge and therefore is illegal.

ItemType.name: shield reaper Akan shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the Akan 30 LAUNCHER cannon. This version is capable to disrupt even the most powerful shields.

ItemType.name: Tracing Akan 30 shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the Akan 30 LAUNCHER cannon. Each shell has limited tracking capabilities.

ItemType.name: high speed Akan 30 shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the Akan 30 LAUNCHER cannon. This shell is lighter and much faster than normal ammo.

ItemType.name: Fragmenting Akan 30 shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the Akan 30 LAUNCHER cannon. This version fragments on impact.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly missile cartridge
ItemType.description: This is a cartridge for the Dragonfly missile system. Each cartridge contains three micro-missiles.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly thermonuclear cartridge
ItemType.description: This is a cartridge for the Dragonfly LAUNCHER missile system. Each cartridge contains three micro-missiles. This is a stronger thermonuclear military version.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly Kinetic cartridge
ItemType.description: This is a cartridge for the Dragonfly LAUNCHER missile system. This version of the cartridge has no explosives and rely only on impact.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly High Speed cartridge
ItemType.description: This is a cartridge for the Dragonfly LAUNCHER missile system. Each cartridge contains three micro-missiles. This shell is lighter and much faster than normal ammo.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly high momentum cartridge
ItemType.description: This is a cartridge for the Dragonfly LAUNCHER missile system. Each cartridge contains three micro-missiles.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly Fragmenting cartridge
ItemType.description: This is a cartridge for the Dragonfly LAUNCHER missile system. Each cartridge contains three micro-missiles. Each missile fragments in dozens of highly explosive shards. Used only by the military.

ItemType.name: Nandao bolt cartridge
ItemType.description: This energy cartridge is used by the Nandao bolt cannon.

ItemType.name: Nandao Flare cartridge
ItemType.description: This energy cartridge is used by the Nandao bolt LAUNCHER. When hit a dense charged sphere of particles is emitted.

ItemType.name: Nandao Fragmenting cartridge
ItemType.description: This energy cartridge is used by the Nandao bolt LAUNCHER. This version contains microcharges that fragment the bolt and generate a deadly shower of particles.

ItemType.name: Nandao Flux cartridge
ItemType.description: This energy cartridge is used by the Nandao bolt LAUNCHER. This version generate a dense flux of particles when explode.

ItemType.name: kiloton shell 1 kton
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the kiloton cannon. Standard version.

ItemType.name: kiloton shell 0.5 kton
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the kiloton LAUNCHER. This lighter version is used on tactical assault ships.

ItemType.name: kiloton shell 2 kton
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the kiloton LAUNCHER. Caution, this version has a real large blast radius.

ItemType.name: tracking pods kiloton shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the kiloton LAUNCHER. This version releases dozens of tracking micronuke pods.

ItemType.name: thermo cannon shell
ItemType.description: Fired by thermo cannons, these rounds pack the yield of a nuclear device in a small, mass-produced shell.

ItemType.name: tracking thermo shell
ItemType.description: Fired by thermo LAUNCHERS, these rounds pack the yield of a nuclear device in a small, mass-produced shell. This cartridge has limited self-tracking ability

ItemType.name: high speed thermo shell
ItemType.description: Fired by thermo LAUNCHERS, these rounds pack the yield of a nuclear device in a small, mass-produced shell. This cartridge is designed to nearly reach the speed of light.

ItemType.name: high momentum thermo shell
ItemType.description: Fired by thermo LAUNCHERS, these rounds pack the yield of a nuclear device in a small, mass-produced shell.

ItemType.name: TM3 warhead
ItemType.description: These warheads are launched by Taikon's TM multitarget cannon. This version splits into three indipendent missiles.

ItemType.name: TM7 warhead
ItemType.description: These warheads are launched by Taikon's TM multitarget cannon.. This version splits into seven indipendent missiles.

ItemType.name: TM10 warhead
ItemType.description: These warheads are launched by Taikon's TM multitarget cannon.. This version splits into ten indipendent missiles

ItemType.name: TMF warhead
ItemType.description: These warheads are launched by Taikon's TM multitarget cannon. This version has a 100 kiloton charge released in one single thermonuclear explosion.

ItemType.name: Kytryn plasma pod
ItemType.description: These alien warheads are launched by the Kytryn launcher.
